addr: St Thomas' Hospital. Westminster Bridge Road. London SE1 7EH GB
title: Free hand injuries workshop for GPs and practice nurses at St Thomas’ Hospital
desc: Guy?s and St Thomas' would like to invite all GPs and practice nurses to a free evening workshop on Monday 18 January.    Topics include:???  Hand and plastics emergency services (trauma and elective hand surgery)  Referral pathways  How to manage hand trauma in primary care Management of wounds (dressings, suture removal, scar management)  Hand therapy session  Cost:  free    Date: Monday 13 July 2015 (7-9pm)    Venue:? South Wing Lecture Theatre, St Thomas? Hospital, Westminster Bridge Road, London, SE1 7EH Light supper will be provided.    There will be clinical case discussions and attendance certificates.?? This evening event carries two CPD points.  There will be also the opportunity for a tour of the unit.
